RVP security mechanisms

  • Every security principal (user, server, etc.) has an X.509v3 Certificate

  • Connections are SSL-secured (encryption, authentication)

  • Security can be administered at the method level

    • e.g. authentication for NOTIFYs but not for UNSUBSCRIBE
    • Security <-> performance tradeoffs can be made by administrators
